lexUnit.name: request.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: ask politely or formally in an effort to bring something about.

sentence.text: There was the sound of feet being carefully wiped on the doormat , as once sharply requested by Mrs Stych soon after her marriage had taken her into polite circles .
